text:
It is possible to submit an empty navigation title entry which is stored in
sitetree.xml as: 

<node id="tutorial">
<label xml:lang="en"/>
Due to this entry the site-tree disappears in the site area.
creator: jann.forrer@id.unizh.ch

text:
Should we disallow empty titles, or should we fix the disappearing of the
sitetree? IMO we should try to find out why the sitetree disappears.
creator: andreas@apache.org

text:
Now the sitetree displays [no title] for empty navigation titles. It's not
i18n-ized (yet), but I don't think this is necessary because it should appear
only very rarely.
creator: andreas@apache.org

text:
I applied your changes to lenya-1.2 too. I think that's engough in order to
prevent the sitetree from disappearing.
Any empty navigation title should only happen by accident anyway ;-)
creator: jann.forrer@id.unizh.ch
